channel.title: Lfi on Fieryrival's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lfi on Fieryrival's Blog

item.title: Beyond the Blog: Exploiting WordPress CVEs on HTB 'MetaTwo'
item.description: Write-up for ‘MetaTwo’, a box that involves exploiting WordPress CVEs with multiple vectors (SQLi, XXE, LFI) for foothold, and then leveraging passpie for root privilege escalation.

item.title: From Spring Boot LFI to Ansible Root: A Guide to HTB 'Inject'
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox with Springboot application for foothold and ansible for privilege escalation.
